fields.name: Movie List
fields.value:
[Click here](https://epimethia.github.io/movielist.html) for the current list of movies that I intend to go through.
I won't be following it exactly but it's a general idea of what we're watching. Check #announcements for the current movie!

fields.name: Times
fields.value:
Will usually be [10:30pm - 11:00pm NZT](https://www.thetimezoneconverter.com/?t=10%3A30%20pm&tz=New%20Zealand&) (click to see it in your local time!).
If i haven't made an announcement about it, DM or @ me to check!

fields.name: Spontaneous Movies and Shows
fields.value: Every now and then, I'll watch a show that isn't on the list. Feel free to jump in at any time to join me, or give yourself the @Spontaneous Show role to get notified.

fields.name: Roles
fields.value:
Get yourself notification roles by reacting to this message!
:popcorn: to receive scheduled movie notifications
:tv: to receive spontaneous show/movie notifications

fields.name: Chats
fields.value:
Please read the #rules.
#general chat is for any and all conversation. Keep things civil.
#movie-chat is for chats about anything related to movies. Please use spoiler tags if you're talking about something we haven't seen!
#suggestions is for any and all suggestions to make the server better or to suggest movies. Feel free to ping me!
